email_subject: Update on Recent Cyber Security Ontology and Upcoming Events
email_body:
Dear Dan Klaus,

I hope this email finds you well. I wanted to discuss some crucial updates in the field of cyber security ontology, being that you are a leading author in this area.

As you may be aware, Gale Robinson has also made significant contributions to the field. Notably, he has just attended GraphConnect and has plans to attend SIGAPP in the near future.

Furthermore, I thought you should be aware that a few members from our team, including Jennifer Singer, Lars Treble, Patricia Gardi, and Josephine Baldi, are now reporting to Moses Sharp. Ray Levinson, who also recently attended GraphConnect, has now joined this team as well.

I believe that this could be a great opportunity for you to interact with Gale and the team, and bring fresh perspectives to your work in ontology for cyber security. To facilitate a possible collaboration, I suggest scheduling a meeting with Gale and Moses's team in the near future.

To facilitate a smooth scheduling process, we have set up a unique link HERE. Please, click on it to choose a convenient time.

Looking forward to your continued excellence in cyber security.

Best,

Jane Tailor
